basics.name: pongou
basics.description:
Create a competitive Pong game app with integrated betting functionality. The app should include:
Game Mechanics:

Classic Pong gameplay mechanics with modern controls
Best of 3 matches format (first to win 2 games)
Real-time multiplayer functionality

Betting System:

Secure escrow system that holds players' stakes during matches
Automated payout system to winners
Minimum and maximum bet limits
Transaction history and betting statistics
Clear fee structure for platform usage

User Interface:

Clean, modern dashboard showing:

Available matches with their stake amounts
Player rankings and win/loss records
Live matches currently in progress
Historical match results


Match creation interface where players can:

Set their stake amount
Choose match settings (speed, paddle size, etc.)
Add match description or requirements



User Features:

User profiles with reputation system
Wallet integration for deposits/withdrawals
Match history and statistics
Chat functional
